data.claim: awesome-mcp-servers (github.com/punkpeye/awesome-mcp-servers) is the definitive MCP server directory with 80.7k GitHub stars. Categories include: Aggregators, Browser Automation, Databases, Communication, File Systems, Knowledge & Memory, Developer Tools, and 30+ more. Production-ready and experimental servers available.
data.snippet: A curated list of awesome Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers. MCP is an open protocol that enables AI models to securely interact with local and remote resources through standardized server implementations.
